The video below discusses SQL joins. These actions are used to combine data across two or more tables in a database. These are extremely important and useful in practice!

I highly recommend watching the video using the 'full' Panopto player. There is a 'pop out' button in the bottom right of the video to enter this viewer.

The notebook written in the video is available [here](https://colab.research.google.com/github/jbpost2/ST-554-Big-Data-with-Python/blob/main/02_Big_Data_Management/Big_Data_Management_Notebook.ipynb).
